sect1.title: Changelog
sect1.para: This is version &version; of the Linux From Scratch book, dated &releasedate;. If this book is more than two months old, a newer and better version is probably already available. To find out, please check one of the mirrors via .
Below is a list of changes made since the previous release of the book, first a summary, then a detailed log.

listitem.para: Updated sparc commands for cross-tools glibc.
Fixed startfile prefix commands to work with multiple archs.
Added target triplets for Sparc and adjusted ppc target triplet.
Added patch for ncurses which fixes cross-compile build issues.
Fixed CC variable used in glibc headers.
Added ppc specific info to glibc headers build.
Added patch for gcc to fix gcc.c's search paths.
Fixed Grub instructions (stages kept in /usr/lib/grub now).
Added fix_test patch to final glibc build.
Added sed to shared and final cross gcc to fix libgcc_s.so search path (thanks Eric-Jan).
Removed stale reference to libidn in glibc-headers section.
Reverted build instructions for temp util-linux and final ncurses.
Removed kernel headers patch for inet-utils - fixed with linux-libc-headers-2.6.11.2.
Removed building of texinfo in chapter 6 (matching the scripts).
Moved building of perl in chapter 6 to chapter 9 (Puts it in same place as other tools needed for testing, and means that it won't be cross-compiled).
Changed chapter 6 ncurses build flags back to --with-build-cc=gcc to match the target scripts.
Updated gcc builds in cross-tools, to match cross-lfs scripts.
Removed libidn from glibc builds in cross-tools.
Swapped --host and --build for glibc in cross-tools, minor changes to gcc.
Added --disable-libstdcxx-pch back to gcc in temp-system.
Fixed util-linux in chroot, added missing ARCH="" and CPU="".
Fixed typos in gcc-final in cross-tools.
Updated util-linux instructions to ignore ARCH and CPU variables.
Fixed glibc in cross-tools, to force threads and tls support.
Changed target-triplet table to use -pc- instead of -unknown-.
Fixed binutils build issue in temp-system, Thanks Richard Downing.
Removed bintuils copy libiberty, duplicated from previous chapter.
Removed gawk sed, not needed anymore.
Fixed compile issues on alternative architectures in temp-system, and reboot.
Fixed typos and names of 'Chroot' or 'Reboot' sections.
Corrected a chown command in the Adding the LFS User section.
Removed spurious command to chown lfs $HOME/cross-tools. If the user is following the book, that directory will be created by lfs and will by default be owned by lfs.
Added missing --host flag to the cross-tool's gcc-final build.
Changed comment about libidn to a note to make it more visible.
Fixed sed command for gawk versioning - wouldn't work when using numbers directly.
Changed variables from ${LFS_BUILD} to ${LFS_HOST} - we never set a LFS_BUILD variable; we only use a modified LFS_HOST when it matches the target arch.
Added missing --host flag for various Chapter 6 packages.
Moved instructions for populating dev till after directories are created.
Added a sed to change fixincludes search path, thanks Ryan Oliver.
Added temp-system/choose.xml to can select the reboot or chroot method. Modified the navigational XSL engine to read the book linearly regardless if the user choose the reboot or the chroot method.
Added a chown to the LFS directory to prevent issues with the reboot scenario.
Corrected a build issue with e2fsprogs in reboot.
Corrected grammar in gcc builds. Thanks Matt.
Corrected a build issue that prevent sysvinit in reboot to install.
Removed an uneeded patch from inetutils in reboot.
Adding the kernel and bootloaders to finish the reboot section.
Fixed binutils in cross-tools to prevent improper linkage in final gcc, thanks Ryan Oliver.
Fixed up wording based on Ryan's input.
Updated bash patch, thanks Jeremy Utley.
Removed bad setting /tools to LFS user, thanks Jeremy Utley.
Fixed a possible issue due to target triplets have either pc or unknown, thanks Jeremy Utley.
Fixed typo on Binutils, set to incorrect directory thanks Jeremy Utley.
Removed libidn in cross-tools glibc start files.
Fixed variables in temp-system to add to ~/.bashrc properly.
Removed uncessary information from temp-system gcc.
Removed uneeded sed from temp-system zlib.
Removed uneeded sed from temp-system gawk.
Fixed typo in gzip in temp-system.
Fixed typo in diffutils in temp-system.
Updated commands in gcc for cross-tools.
Added final-system/perl-pass1.xml to can validate the sources again.
Several ID values changes to match the current dirs structure. Renamed administrativa.xml to resources.xml.
Added missing headers creation in cross-lfs glibc-headers.
Added what to do if you need to stop/start a build in cross-tools and temp-tools
Fixed build issue glibc-full in cross-tools.
Added export of ${LFS_TARGET} tools from temp-system to ~/.bashrc
Fixed chapter 4 typo's and bad text.
Fixed chapter 5 typo's and bad text.
Fixed Static GCC build in cross-tools.
Changed setting of LFS_HOST for target-triplets without 'unknown' and added --host flag to build of binutils.
Removed instruction to run command as root in final-preps/creatingcrossdir.xml.
Added missing userinput tags in cross-tools/variables.xml.
Full sources restructuration to not be constrained any more by hardcoded chapters numbers.
This BOOK is an update of the multi-arch book for the cross-compile usage scenario.
